report: Bug Name: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user Bug ID: 1235445 Build Number: Version Number 5.0.1 Severity: Critic <priority.Priority: HIGH Reported By: Margarita Status: New Environment: Windows 2003/SQL Server 2005 Description: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user in the application Steps to Reproduce: 1) Login into the Application, 2) Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User, 3) Filled out all the user informatio0n fields, 4) Clicked on the ‘Save’ button, 5) Seen an error page “ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error…”, 6) See the attached logs for more information (Attach more logs related to the bug..IF any), 7) Also see the attached screenshot of the error page Expected Result: "On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message 'New User has been created successfully
